memberdef.name: N_OF_PMT_PER_ECASIC
memberdef.initializer: 6 /* number of PMT on EC ASIC board */

memberdef.name: N_OF_ECASIC_PER_PDM
memberdef.initializer: 6 /* number of EC ASIC boards in PDM */

memberdef.name: DATA_TYPE_SCI_INT16
memberdef.initializer: 2 /* Scientific integrated data with 16 bit pixels*/

memberdef.name: DATA_TYPE_SCI_INT32
memberdef.initializer: 3 /* Scientific integrated data with 32 bit pixels */

memberdef.name: DATA_TYPE_SCI_L1
memberdef.initializer: 10 /* Scientific data attached with L1 event*/

memberdef.initializer: 11 /* Scientific data attached with L2 event*/

memberdef.name: DATA_TYPE_SCI_L3
memberdef.initializer: 12 /* Scientific data attached with L3 event*/

memberdef.name: TRIG_AUTO
memberdef.initializer: 0 /* Auto triggered data (in absence of others triggers)*/
